content.rendered:
Our new Artiste Range is the sensual, artisanal addition to our catalogue that is sure to find favour among those who demand aesthetic brilliance at an attractive price.

The LUDWIG Footstool is a contemporary stool, ideal for hotels, bars, lounges and offices as well as any other commercial venue. 

Available in a wide selection of faux leathers, fabrics or any other material (see below). The LUDWIG is lovingly handmade and available in a wide range of wood stains, RAL Colours and finishes.

These items are lovingly made to order and must be purchased in a reasonable quantity. There is no minimum order on this item, however the more you buy, the cheaper carriage will be on a pro-rata basis.

As these items are made to order you can customise this to suit your needs. Please call or email us if you have a bespoke request.

We suggest using ‘Panaz’ as standard for material. If you’d rather choose your own fabric please select from the materials below & call or email us. (COM – Customers Own Material).

Please click on the below links to view the fabric selection from Panaz:

– Panaz Marna Weave

– Panaz Luxe Velvet

– Panaz Aston Faux

We’d be happy to send you free material samples.

This item has a 1 year warranty. 

These items require some basic self assembly. Throw cushions POA.
